oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Pvt. John Drew McClanahan to his father
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from Pvt. John Drew McClanahan, Co. C, 9th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA, to his father after the Battle of Shiloh. Recounting the day, he writes, "You have no doubt heard of the fight on the Tennessee Riverwe fell back to this place. We gained a victory. Gen. Beauregard say he accomplished all he expected. I was in the hottest of the fight and escaped with a very slight wound. Our company suffered considerably."
